achievements.label: A WOUND UNTO ETERNITY
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>And I will forgive nothing.<i>

[At Berlin, you became a Name of the Wolf-Divided.]

achievements.label: UNMADE
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I fell in battle.<i>

[You suffered five Wounds and Debilitations, and perished.]

achievements.label: NO MORE
achievements.descriptionLocked: Despair, the wolf that devours thought, devoured me.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: Despair, the wolf that devours thought, devoured me.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>Despair, the wolf that devours thought, devoured me.<i>

[You suffered five Traumas, and lost the will to go on.]

achievements.label: LUPUS LUPUM CAEDIT
achievements.descriptionLocked: I took my revenge against the one called Exile.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I took my revenge against the one called Exile.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I took my revenge against the one called Exile.<i>

[You set yourself against the Exile and their Foe, and won.]

achievements.label: MUCH IS TAKEN, MUCH ABIDES
achievements.descriptionLocked: To them, I say: peace never lasts, but war always ends.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: To them, I say: peace never lasts, but war always ends.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>To them, I say: peace never lasts, but war always ends.<i>

[You carried your Hope far enough and turned your back on the Wolf-Divided.]

achievements.label: A WOLF DOES NOT REGRET
achievements.descriptionLocked: I am the victim of your betrayal; of your negligence; but most of all, your complacency.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I am the victim of your betrayal; of your negligence; but most of all, your complacency.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I am the victim of your betrayal; of your negligence; but most of all, your complacency.<i>

[You fought an unspeakable campaign of slaughter across Europe, were tried for crimes against humanity, and were ultimately executed by the Duties.]

achievements.label: A WHIMPER IN THE DARK
achievements.descriptionLocked: This night is the last night. Mother forgive me.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: This night is the last night. Mother forgive me.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>This night is the last night. Mother forgive me.<i>

[You fought a campaign of slaughter across Europe, lost all purpose after the war, and found yourself a lonely place to die.]

achievements.label: THE FIRE FORESTALLED
achievements.descriptionLocked: And when shepherds become complacent, the Wolf will know.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: And when shepherds become complacent, the Wolf will know.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>And when shepherds become complacent, the Wolf will know.<i>

[You fought a crude campaign of slaughter across Europe, but ultimately perished during the carnage at Berlin.]
